item.title: 地产投资商拉萨尔称欧洲 30% 的办公空间可能 "过时
item.description: 拉萨尔投资管理公司（LaSalle Investment Management）欧洲区负责人周二表示，该公司正在减少对欧洲写字楼的投资，并认为该地区 20% 至 30% 的写字楼空间可能已经 "过时"。【原文：LaSalle Investment Management is reducing its exposure to offices in Europe and believes between 20% and 30% of office space in the region could be "obsolete", the firm's head of Europe said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 价格下跌后，美国开发商 Greystar 瞄准法国和德国
item.description: 美国房地产公司 Greystar 的执行董事周二告诉路透社，该公司预计今年将在欧洲房地产上花费超过 14 亿欧元（15.3 亿美元），因为它希望抓住法国和德国近期房价下跌的机会。【原文：U.S. property firm Greystar expects to spend more than 1.4 billion euros ($1.53 billion) on European real estate this year as it looks to seize on recent price falls in France and Germany, its executive director told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司 2 月份喷气客机交付量降至 27 架
item.description: 波音公司（Boeing Co）周二表示，该公司 2 月份交付了 27 架飞机，比去年同期减少了一架。【原文：Boeing Co said on Tuesday it had delivered 27 airplanes in February, down one unit from the same month a year ago, as the U.S. planemaker faces curbs on production growth.】

item.title: 谷歌限制人工智能聊天机器人 "双子座 "回答有关全球选举的询问
item.description: Alphabet 旗下公司谷歌周二表示，将限制人工智能聊天机器人 "双子座"（Gemini）回答有关今年全球大选的问题，以避免在部署该技术时可能出现的失误。【原文：Google is restricting AI chatbot Gemini from answering questions about the global elections set to happen this year, the Alphabet-owned firm said on Tuesday, as it looks to avoid potential missteps in the deployment of the technology.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，白宫就黑客事件传唤 UnitedHealth 首席执行官
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》援引消息人士的话报道，白宫官员在周二的一次会议上敦促联合健康集团首席执行官安德鲁-威蒂（Andrew Witty）向受其技术部门黑客攻击影响的医疗服务提供商提供更多紧急资金。【原文：White House officials at a meeting on Tuesday urged UnitedHealth Group CEO Andrew Witty to make more emergency funding available to healthcare providers affected by a hack at its tech unit, the Washington Post reported, citing sources.】

item.title: 波音公司举报人被发现死于自杀
item.description: 据南卡罗来纳州当局称，波音公司前雇员约翰-巴尼特（John Barnett）被发现死于自杀，据报道他曾对公司的生产问题表示担忧。【原文：John Barnett, a former Boeing employee who had reportedly raised concerns about the company's production issues, was found dead of an apparent suicide, according to authorities in South Carolina.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团 2024 年将在工厂和供应链领域投资超过 6.5 亿美元
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）周二表示，今年计划向其制造工厂和供应链投资超过 6.5 亿美元，以提高生产能力，支持商业和国防客户的需求。【原文：GE Aerospace said on Tuesday it planned to invest over $650 million into its manufacturing plants and supply chain this year to boost its production capacity to support demand from commercial and defense clients.】

item.title: 日经》报道：日产、本田考虑削减在华产量
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，面对比亚迪和其他电动汽车制造商的激烈竞争，日本日产汽车和本田汽车正在考虑削减在中国的生产。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor and Honda Motor are considering cutting production in China as they face stiff competition from BYD and other electric vehicle makers, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 意法半导体首席执行官称尽管美国发动芯片战，但中国仍是一个增长型市场
item.description: 法国意大利半导体公司意法半导体（STMicroelectronics）首席执行官周二表示，尽管中美在半导体问题上的关系日益紧张，但中国仍是该公司重要的增长市场。【原文：China remains an important growth market for French-Italian semiconductor STMicroelectronics, despite increasing U.S-China tensions over semiconductors, the company's chief executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 最高银行监管机构称各机构对资本加息调整持 "开放态度
item.description: 美国一位主要的银行监管机构周二表示，政府将以 "开放的态度 "对一项有争议的提高大型银行资本要求的计划进行修改。【原文：A leading U.S. bank regulator said Tuesday that the government will be "open-minded" about making changes to a contentious plan to raise large bank capital requirements.】

item.title: 丰田成为亚洲被做空最多的大盘股 - Hazeltree
item.description: 数据公司 Hazeltree 周二发布的一份报告显示，汽车制造商丰田汽车公司成为亚太地区对冲基金 2 月份做空最多的大盘股，超过了武田制药。【原文：Automaker Toyota Motor Corp became the most shorted large-cap stock by hedge funds in the Asia Pacific region in February, overtaking Takeda Pharmaceutical , a report from data firm Hazeltree showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）主席表示，该委员会将在今年夏天之前发布关于纵向一体化模式的规则
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席罗斯廷-贝赫南（Rostin Behnam）周二表示，该委员会计划在今年夏天之前公布一项有关控股公司内部垂直整合模式的规则。【原文：The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission plans to publish a rule about vertically integrated models within a holding company by summer, Chairman Rostin Behnam said Tuesday.】

item.title: 策略师称，收益率曲线倒挂不再是经济衰退的可靠信号
item.description: 路透社调查显示，近三分之二的策略师认为，美国债券市场暗示经济衰退即将来临的一个关键指标已不再可靠。【原文：A key indicator of an oncoming recession implied by the U.S. bond market is no longer reliable, according to nearly two-thirds of strategists polled by Reuters.】

item.title: 裕信银行因制裁俄罗斯和担保索赔案面临听证
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）周二表示，在一家俄罗斯能源公司起诉这家意大利银行因国际制裁而未能履行担保付款后，该银行第二季度将在英国和俄罗斯面临法庭听证。【原文：UniCredit faces court hearings in Britain and Russia in the second quarter after a Russian energy company sued the Italian bank for failing to honour guarantee payments because of international sanctions, UniCredit said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国2月CPI通胀乏力引发美联储6月降息质疑
item.description: 由于汽油和住房成本上升，2 月份美国消费者物价稳健增长，这表明通胀具有一定的粘性，可能会推迟美联储 6 月份的降息预期。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased solidly in February amid higher costs for gasoline and shelter, suggesting some stickiness in inflation that could delay an anticipated June interest rate cut from Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 金宝汤完成价值 23.3 亿美元的索沃斯交易
item.description: 美国包装食品制造商金宝汤在获得联邦贸易委员会批准数周后，于本周二表示已完成对 Rao's Homemade 所有者 Sovos Brands 的收购。【原文：Campbell Soup has completed the acquisition of Rao's Homemade-owner Sovos Brands , the U.S. packaged food maker said on Tuesday, weeks after receiving clearance from the Federal Trade Commission.】

item.title: 保时捷在疲软的中国市场坚持 "价值重于销量 "战略
item.description: 在疲软的中国市场上，保时捷不会参与激烈的折扣战，而是坚持其原则，即使会损失豪华汽车制造商的市场份额，也要维持高端价格。【原文：Porsche will not take part in a fierce discount battle in the weakened Chinese market, and is instead sticking to its principle of maintaining premium prices even if it costs the luxury carmaker market share.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布后，交易员继续押注 6 月美联储首次降息
item.description: 尽管一份政府报告显示，根据与美国中央银行政策利率挂钩的期货合约价格计算，上个月消费者物价涨幅超出预期，但美联储决策者仍被认为将在 6 月份开始降息。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers are still seen starting interest-rate cuts in June, even as a government report showed consumer prices rose last month more than expected, based on prices of futures contracts that settle to the U.S. central bank's policy rate.】

item.title: 灰度计划分拆现货比特币 ETF
item.description: 数字资产管理公司Grayscale Investments周二申请分拆其现货比特币交易所交易基金（ETF）--Grayscale Bitcoin Trust（GBTC）。【原文：Digital asset manager Grayscale Investments on Tuesday filed for a spin-off of its spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) .】

item.title: 汽油和住房成本拉动 2 月份美国消费者物价上涨
item.description: 由于汽油和住房成本上升，2 月份美国消费者物价稳健增长，这表明通胀具有一定的粘性，可能会推迟美联储 6 月份的降息预期。【原文：U.S. consumer prices increased solidly in February amid higher costs for gasoline and shelter, suggesting some stickiness in inflation that could delay an anticipated June interest rate cut from Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 解说员：欧洲央行将改变向银行提供重要流动性的方式
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将于周三宣布其操作框架审查的结果，这是一项技术性但至关重要的工作，将为未来几年如何向商业银行提供流动性制定规则。【原文：The European Central Bank will announce on Wednesday the outcome of its Operational Framework Review, a technical but vital exercise that will set rules for how it provides liquidity to commercial banks in the coming years.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席执行官认为商业地产动荡将持续到 2024 年
item.description: 德意志银行首席执行官周二表示，他预计当前的商业房地产危机将持续到 2024 年，贷款损失准备金将处于预计范围的上限。【原文：Deutsche Bank's chief executive officer said on Tuesday that he expects the current crisis in commercial real estate to continue in 2024 and that provisions for loan losses will be at the upper end of its projected range.】

item.title: 贝莱德将所持波罗的海金属公司股份降至 4
item.description: Polymetal周二表示，美国基金管理公司贝莱德本月将其在金矿商Polymetal的持股比例从7.44%降至4.01%。【原文：U.S. fund manager BlackRock reduced its stake in gold miner Polymetal to 4.01% from 7.44% this month, Polymetal said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果将允许开发者直接从其网站发布应用程序
item.description: 苹果公司周二表示，作为欧盟迫使苹果开放其封闭生态系统的新规定所要求的变革的一部分，使用苹果应用商店的软件开发商将能够在今年春季直接从其网站上向欧盟用户发布应用程序。【原文：Software developers who use Apple's App Store will be able to distribute apps to EU users directly from their websites this spring, the company said on Tuesday, as part of changes required by new EU rules forcing Apple to open up its closed eco-system.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚法国炼油厂称火灾后已履行合同
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司发言人表示，自周一法国北部杰罗姆-格拉文雄港炼油厂发生大火以来，该公司已利用现有库存履行了所有交货合同。【原文：Exxon Mobil fulfilled from existing stock all its delivery contracts from its refinery in Port Jerome-Gravenchon in northern France since it was hit by a major fire on Monday, a spokesperson for the company said.】

item.title: 据表媒报道，马斯克将于周三参观德国千兆工厂
item.description: 据 Table Media 周二援引公司消息人士的话报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将于周三上午参观特斯拉位于德国的千兆工厂，上周附近的一座电力塔遭到纵火袭击，导致工厂停电并停止生产。【原文：Elon Musk will visit Tesla's gigafactory in Germany on Wednesday morning after an arson attack on a nearby power pylon last week left it without electricity and halted production, Table Media reported on Tuesday, citing company sources.】

item.title: 曼联第二季度盈利增长
item.description: 由于参加了本赛季利润丰厚的欧洲冠军联赛（UEFA Champions League）初期阶段的比赛，曼联第二季度的利润有所增长，但曼联周二仍维持其对 2024 年的预测不变。【原文：Manchester United kept its 2024 forecast unchanged on Tuesday after posting a rise in profit for the second quarter due to its participation in the early stages of the lucrative UEFA Champions League this season.】

item.title: 科尔百货假日季度销售额降幅低于预期
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周二公布的季度销售额降幅小于预期，这主要得益于其服装和鞋类产品的假日折扣，以及丝芙兰（Sephora）门店强劲的美容产品销售。【原文：Kohl's on Tuesday posted a smaller-than-expected drop in quarterly sales, helped by holiday discounts for its apparel and footwear as well as strong beauty sales at its Sephora stores.】

item.title: 渣打银行投资银行主管库珀将离职
item.description: 渣打银行周二表示，投资银行主管西蒙-库珀（Simon Cooper）将离职，作为管理层调整的一部分，罗伯托-霍恩韦格（Roberto Hoornweg）和苏尼尔-考沙尔（Sunil Kaushal）将接任企业与投资银行联席主管。【原文：Standard Chartered's head of investment banking Simon Cooper is to leave, the lender said on Tuesday as part of a management reshuffle that will see Roberto Hoornweg and Sunil Kaushal take over as co-heads of corporate and investment banking.】

item.title: 西南航空公司再次下调波音公司的喷气机交付预测
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周二再次下调了对供应商波音公司飞机交付数量的预期，导致这家美国国内最大的航空公司削减了 2024 年下半年的运力。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Tuesday once again cut its forecast for the number of aircraft deliveries it expects from supplier Boeing - causing the largest domestic U.S. carrier to cut its capacity for the second half of 2024.】
